The '''Wind Release: Repeated Rasenshuriken''' is a ninjutsu created and utilised by Naruto Uzumaki. 

== Usage ==
After activating [[Kurama Mode]] or [[Sage Mode]] (in the anime), Naruto is able to form two [[Rasenshuriken]] and wield both at the same time. Their cutting power is so extreme that by using one of them as a melee weapon, Naruto was able to cut through the [[Ten-Tails]]' extremely durable tails with ease.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 617, pages 11-12</ref>
